description: If you are looking to charter a not-so-standard yacht this could be the place to go. They have for example a number of [Ovnis](http://www.alubat.com/ranges/ranges-ovni/?lang=en), [Pogo 8.50](http://www.pogostructures.com/en/structures/the-early-designs/pogo-850/) and also a [Pogo 30](http://picassol.co/post/73095521753/pogo-30-here-we-come) now.
